body: A 33-year-old man died yesterday afternoon in a scuba diving accident 10 miles off of Brooklyn, the police said. The man, who was not identified last night pending family notification, was diving with a group on a boat called the Karen, which had left from Gerritsen Beach. The group spent about an hour and a half underwater. When the man did not
title: Scuba Diver, 33, Dies Off Brooklyn Shore

body: The driver of a white Jaguar that plowed into a subway station in Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, on Sunday, hitting a woman who lost her leg in the accident, was arrested yesterday and charged with drunken driving, the police said. The driver, Donna Dashosh, 45, of Gerritsen Beach, Brooklyn, surrendered to detectives at the 61st Precinct stationhouse on
title: Driver Arrested In Hit-and-Run That Crippled A Pedestrian
